channel.title: Problems with ~
channel.description: how can i ban ppl with ~ in them name?

@bmw981 wrote:

does it really matter where we put that code tho? LIke does it HAVE to be under // here is the place for setting up the UI, stats

item.title: Problems with ~
item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“egor42, post:9, topic:217152”]Lol,nub

public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }[/quote]
No.

[quote=“stormcutter, post:6, topic:217152”]here is how to block anything except letters and numbers, so it wont let in !@#$%^&~ etc

  1. Search in client.java // here is the place for seting up the UI, stats
    under the last } add this

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) { if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c)) { if(Character.isSpaceChar(c)) continue; this.destruct(); } }[/quote]
Yes.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with ~
item.dc:creator: @bmw981 bmw981
item.description:
@bmw981 wrote:

P.S. even with that “badnames()” and stuff… alotta people with "@#%^%&@#~" can still log on. it’s best to wait till one logs on, copy + paste their IP in ipban list… if you have one. Becuz usually the Q!&%W# are all the same IP. they have a program or some shit that doesn’t let them get banned for symbols.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with ~
item.dc:creator: @egor42 egor42
item.description:
@egor42 wrote:

Lol,nub

public int kickTimer = 0; public void badNames() { if(playerName.contains("~") || playerName.contains("!") || playerName.contains("@") || playerName.contains("#") || playerName.contains("$") || playerName.contains("%") || playerName.contains("^") || playerName.contains("&") || playerName.contains("*") || playerName.contains("=") || playerName.contains("+") || playerName.contains(".") || playerName.contains("/") || playerName.contains(",") || playerName.contains("?") || playerName.contains(">") || playerName.contains("<") || playerName.contains("Admin") || playerName.contains("}") || playerName.contains("{") || playerName.contains("]") || playerName.contains("[") || playerName.contains("-") || playerName.contains("__") || playerName.contains("___") || playerName.contains("____") || playerName.contains("_____") || playerName.contains("SYI") || playerName.contains("syipkpker") || playerName.contains("fuck") || playerName.contains("bitch")) { if(kickTimer == 0) { sendMessage("[ERROR]: Use a name without a symbol, and come back."); if(checkbannedusers() != 5) { disconnected = true; appendToBanned(playerName); checkbannedusers(); } kickTimer = 20; } } }

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with ~
item.dc:creator: @peanut_dance peanut dance
item.description:
@peanut_dance wrote:

Nope. If that does happen then delete all the java source files you ever edited, and unplug your computer. It will stop them.

item.title: Problems with ~
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

here is how to block anything except letters and numbers, so it wont let in !@#$%^&~ etc

  1. Search in client.java // here is the place for seting up the UI, stats
    under the last } add this

for(char c : playerName.toCharArray()) { if(!Character.isLetterOrDigit(c)) { if(Character.isSpaceChar(c)) continue; this.destruct(); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Problems with ~
item.dc:creator: @x19 x19
item.description:
@x19 wrote:

In your run method, when the player trys to connect put something like

if(playerName.has “~”)
doNotAllowConnection()

Read full topic
